text: Which of the following structures is not essential in a wind pollinated flower?
The resolution of a microscope refers to its power to

options.C: scan the surface of an object

explanation: The resolution of a microscope is its ability to distinguish two close points. Resolution measures the microscope’s ability to distinguish between two points that are close together on an object. If a microscope can clearly distinguish between the two points, it has a good or high resolution.

text: The process by which plants manufacture food from carbon dioxide and water using energy from the sun is called
Conduction of water and mineral salts through the xylem vessels is enhanced because the xylem cells are

options.B: long, narrow tubes placed end to end

explanation: Xylem cells haveno cytoplasm or end walls, meaning they form a tube through which water can pass freely to allow water transport. Lignin strengthens the cell walls, helping to support the plant, OR The xylem always includes specialized cells modified for water conduction. These are called Tracheary Elements. These are genetically programmed to die and their empty cell walls then act as a conduit through which water moves up the plant.

text: The name of the enzyme that catalyses the conversion of glucose to glucose-6-phosphate at the beginning of glycolysis is
The correct arrangement of food classes of the same quantity in the order of magnitude of energy value in animals in descending order is

options.A: Carbohydrates, fats and oils, water, protein
options.B: Fats and oils, carbohydrates, protein, water
options.C: Water, fats and oils, carbohydrates, protein
options.D: Protein, fats and oils water and carbohydrates

explanation:
In the order of magnitude of energy value in animals in descending order is Fats and oil, carbohydrates, proteins and water. This is due to the fact that fats and oils have the highest energy value, about twice that of carbohydrates.
Fats and oils contain significantly more energy per gram than carbohydrates. Fats provide approximately 9 calories per gram, while carbohydrates yield around 4 calories per gram. This difference in energy density means that fats are a more concentrated source of fuel for the body.

text: Rhizobium which lives in the root nodules of leguminous plants is an example of the association known as
Ascaris lumbricoides is a parasitic
explanation: Ascaris lumbricoides is a parasitic worm that infects humans. Ascaris lumbricoides is a nematode, or roundworm, that lives in the human intestines. It's the most common parasitic worm in humans. The common name for Ascaris lumbricoides is the human roundworm

A man's who suffers from haemophilia marries a woman who is a carrier, what percentage of their children are likely to be haemophilie?
Which of the following traits may be considered in marriage counseling?
explanation:
Rhesus factor (Rh factor) incompatibility can be a relevant topic in marriage counseling, particularly for couples planning to have children, as it can impact pregnancy outcomes and require specific medical interventions.
The Rh factor is a protein found on the surface of red blood cells, and individuals are either Rh positive (have the protein) or Rh negative (do not have the protein).
Rh incompatibility occurs when a Rh-negative woman is carrying a Rh-positive fetus. The mother's immune system can develop antibodies against the Rh-positive fetal blood cells, which can lead to complications in future pregnancies.
